about.title: About SkillHub
about.subtitle: The open-source marketplace for AI Agent skills

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: SkillHub is building the largest open-source ecosystem for AI Agent skills. We believe in democratizing access to AI capabilities through a community-driven marketplace.

features.title: Why SkillHub?
features.multiPlatformDesc: Works with Claude, OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, and more
features.secureDesc: Every skill is scanned for security vulnerabilities

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with the SkillHub team
contact.githubDesc: For bugs, feature requests, or contributions

support.title: Support SkillHub
support.subtitle: Help us build the best AI skills marketplace
support.emailDesc: Found a bug or have feedback? Send us an email.
support.sponsorDesc: Get your name on our sponsors page
support.whyCryptoDesc: Traditional payment processors (PayPal, Stripe, GitHub Sponsors, Patreon) are not available in all regions. Cryptocurrency allows anyone, anywhere to support open source projects without restrictions.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Quick start guide to install and use skills

authSection.title: Authentication
authSection.description: Most endpoints are public and require no authentication. Endpoints that modify user data require GitHub OAuth authentication via session cookies.
authSection.howTo: Sign in at skills.palebluedot.live to create a session. Authenticated endpoints return 401 if no valid session exists.

rateLimitSection.title: Rate Limiting
rateLimitSection.description: All endpoints are rate-limited using a sliding window algorithm. Rate limit headers are included in responses.
rateLimitSection.headerReset: Unix timestamp when the window resets

errorSection.title: Error Responses
errorSection.description: All errors follow a consistent JSON format.
errorSection.code400: Bad Request — Missing or invalid parameters
errorSection.code404: Not Found — Resource does not exist
errorSection.code429: Too Many Requests — Rate limit exceeded

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Search, browse, and retrieve skill information

skillFiles.title: Skill Files
skillFiles.description: Fetch skill file contents and download as ZIP

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe and unsubscribe from the newsletter

endpoints.getSkill: Get detailed information about a specific skill
endpoints.recentSkills: Get recently added or updated skills
endpoints.addRequest: Request a new skill to be indexed
endpoints.removalRequest: Request removal of a skill you own
endpoints.getSkillFiles: Get all files in a skill folder with content
endpoints.downloadZip: Download skill files as a ZIP archive
endpoints.getRatings: Get ratings and reviews for a skill
endpoints.createRating: Create or update your rating for a skill
endpoints.getMyRating: Get your own rating for a specific skill
endpoints.getFavorites: Get your list of favorited skills
endpoints.addFavorite: Add a skill to your favorites
endpoints.removeFavorite: Remove a skill from your favorites
endpoints.checkFavorites: Check which skills are in your favorites
endpoints.getCategories: Get all skill categories with counts
endpoints.healthCheck: Check API and service health status
endpoints.getAttribution: Get attribution and data source statistics
endpoints.subscribe: Subscribe an email to the newsletter
endpoints.unsubscribe: Unsubscribe an email from the newsletter

params.skillIds: Array of skill IDs to check

notes.searchFallback: Uses Meilisearch when available, falls back to PostgreSQL
notes.viewCount: Increments view count (deduplicated per IP per hour)
notes.installDedup: Download count deduplicated per IP per 5 minutes
notes.zipTransform: Files are transformed for the target platform format (claude, codex, cursor, windsurf, copilot)
notes.cacheInDB: Files are cached in database and served from cache on subsequent requests
notes.alwaysSuccess: Always returns success to prevent email enumeration

content.webInstallDesc: You can also install skills directly from the SkillHub website:
content.webInstallStep1: 1. Find a skill on the Browse page or via search
content.webInstallStep2: 2. On the skill page, use the "Install Skill" section on the right sidebar
content.webInstallMethodFolder: Select Folder and Install — picks a folder on your computer and saves the skill files directly
content.webInstallMethodZip: Download ZIP — downloads the skill files as a ZIP archive to extract manually
content.discoveryIntro: Add a discovery prompt to your project's instruction file and your AI agent will automatically search, install, and use skills from SkillHub when it encounters unfamiliar tasks.
content.modeStandardDesc: Searches for specialized or complex tasks. Balanced, token-efficient — recommended for most projects.
content.modeCompactDesc: Minimal instruction block. Token-efficient for small CLAUDE.md files.
content.modeOneShotDesc: Paste directly into a conversation. No file changes needed.
content.selectMode: Select a mode to see its setup prompt
content.addToFile: Add this block to your CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, or platform-specific instruction file:
content.discoverySetup: Setup: Add to your instruction file
content.discoverySetupDesc: Add this block to your CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, or platform-specific instruction file:
content.crossPlatformDesc: SkillHub works with all major AI coding agents:
content.fullDocsLink: See the full discovery documentation for detailed prompts, search strategies, and advanced configuration.
content.cmdUpdateDesc: Update a skill or use --all to update all
content.platformsDesc: SkillHub CLI supports 5 AI coding platforms:
content.configGithubToken: GitHub token for higher API rate limits

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.description: When you sign in with GitHub, we collect your username, email address, and profile picture. We also store your favorites and ratings.

cookies.title: Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.description: We use local storage to save your theme preference (light/dark mode). We do not use tracking cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use GitHub API for authentication and skill indexing. For donations, we use NOWPayments which has its own privacy policy.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: Your account data is kept until you request deletion. You can request deletion of your data at any time through our support page.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You can request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us through the support page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For privacy-related questions, please visit our support page or open an issue on GitHub.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: SkillHub is a marketplace that indexes AI agent skills from public GitHub repositories. We provide discovery, search, and installation tools for these skills.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: You are responsible for reviewing the source code of any skill before installing it. Skills are third-party code and you install them at your own risk.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.description: Skills on SkillHub are provided "as is" without any warranty. We scan for known malicious patterns but cannot guarantee the safety or functionality of any skill.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: SkillHub is not liable for any damages resulting from the use of skills indexed on this platform. Use at your own risk.

takedown.title: DMCA & Takedown
takedown.description: If you are a repository owner and want your skill removed from SkillHub, please use our claim page to submit a removal request.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of SkillHub after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

claim.title: Manage Skills
claim.subtitle: Request to add new skills or remove your existing skills from SkillHub
claim.loginRequired: Please sign in with GitHub to manage skills

mirror.title: This feature is available on the main site
mirror.description: To claim or add skills, please visit the main site.

form.skillIdHelp: Enter the full skill ID as shown on SkillHub

addForm.reasonPlaceholder: Describe what the skill does and why it would be useful...

success.title: Skill Blocked
success.description: Your skill has been blocked from indexing. It will no longer appear in SkillHub.

addSuccess.title: Request Submitted
addSuccess.description: Your skill request has been submitted. SKILL.md was found and will be indexed soon.
addSuccess.descriptionNoSkillMd: Your request has been submitted. No SKILL.md file was found - the repository will be reviewed manually. You will receive an email if skills are approved for indexing.
addSuccess.descriptionMultiplePrefix: Your request has been submitted. Found
addSuccess.descriptionMultipleSuffix: skills in the repository that will be indexed soon.

error.notOwner: You are not the owner or admin of this repository. Only repository owners can request removal.
error.skillNotFound: This skill was not found in our database.
error.alreadyPending: You already have a pending request for this item.
error.githubError: Failed to verify repository ownership with GitHub. Please try again later.
error.invalidSkill: This skill does not have valid GitHub repository information.
error.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL.
error.invalidRepo: The repository was not found or is not accessible. Please check the URL and ensure the repository is public.
error.rateLimitExceeded: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.
error.networkTimeout: Request timed out while checking the repository. Please try again.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

myRequests.title: My Requests
myRequests.empty: You haven't submitted any requests yet.

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.subtitle: Acknowledging the sources that make SkillHub possible

licenses.title: License Compliance
licenses.description: All indexed skills retain their original licenses. SkillHub provides metadata and search functionality only. We do not modify or redistribute skill code.

howItWorks.title: How Indexing Works
howItWorks.step1: Our crawler discovers public repositories using multiple strategies: GitHub Code Search, topic-based search, curated awesome-lists, and fork network traversal.
howItWorks.step2: We scan for 5 instruction file formats: SKILL.md (Claude), AGENTS.md (Codex), copilot-instructions.md (GitHub Copilot), .cursorrules (Cursor), and .windsurfrules (Windsurf).
howItWorks.step3: We extract metadata (name, description, author, license) and run security scans. Non-standard formats are marked as project-specific configurations.
howItWorks.step4: Users are linked directly to original repositories for installation and usage. We don't modify or redistribute any code.

thanks.title: Special Thanks
thanks.subtitle: We're grateful to these projects and communities

rights.title: Your Rights as a Repository Owner
rights.description: If you are a repository owner and want your skill removed from SkillHub, you can submit a removal request. We respect author preferences and will honor all legitimate requests.

metadata.title: Claude Code Plugin - SkillHub MCP Integration
metadata.description: Get early access to SkillHub's Claude Code integration. Discover and install skills directly from Claude.

hero.title: Skills Discovery Inside Claude Code
hero.subtitleA: Get early access to our Claude Code plugin. Search {count}+ skills and install them with a single command - all from within Claude.
hero.subtitleB: Would you use a Claude Code plugin for skill discovery? Help us prioritize by signing up below.

discovery.title: Semantic Search
discovery.description: Find skills using natural language queries directly in Claude Code.

install.title: One-Click Install
install.description: Install skills without leaving your conversation. No manual file management.

instant.title: Instant Activation
instant.description: Skills are immediately available after installation. No restart needed.

secure.title: Security First
secure.description: Every skill is scanned for malicious patterns before being made available.

example.comment: Ask Claude to find a skill
example.userMessage: Find me a skill for handling PDF files

q1.question: When will the plugin be available?
q1.answer: We're targeting Q1 2026 for the initial release. Early access users will get priority access and the opportunity to provide feedback during beta testing.

q2.question: Will it work with my existing skills?
q2.answer: Yes! The plugin integrates with the standard SKILL.md format used by Claude Code. Your existing skills will continue to work, and you'll be able to discover new ones through SkillHub.

q3.question: Is it free to use?
q3.answer: Yes, the plugin will be completely free and open source, just like the rest of SkillHub. We believe in democratizing access to AI agent skills.

cta.title: Explore Skills Now
cta.description: While you wait for the plugin, browse our collection of {count}+ skills.

form.successDescription: We'll notify you when the Claude Code plugin is ready for beta testing.
form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
form.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
form.privacyNote: We'll only email you about the plugin launch. No spam, ever.

mirror.text: You are visiting a mirror of SkillHub.

banner.text: {count}+ Skills for Claude, Copilot & Codex — Install in Seconds

welcome.subject: Welcome to SkillHub!
welcome.intro: Welcome to SkillHub — the open-source marketplace for AI Agent skills. We're glad you're here!
welcome.whatIs: SkillHub indexes over {count} skills from GitHub that work with Claude, OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, and more.
welcome.newsletterCta: Want to stay updated? Subscribe to our newsletter for new skills, features, and tips.

newsletter.subject: Welcome to SkillHub Newsletter!
newsletter.intro: You're now subscribed to the SkillHub newsletter. You'll receive updates about:
items: New skills added to the marketplace
Tips for using AI agent skills
